name: Atomic Alchemy
headline: We produce cancer-curing materials used in nuclear medicine.
description:
Atomic Alchemy is building a bank of reactors to produce the nuclear material that goes into nuclear medicine. Radiopharmaceuticals are vitally important in biological tracers, diagnostic imaging, and cancer treatments.

Currently, the world's supply of Molybdenum-99, the cornerstone of 80% of all nuclear medicine procedures, is sourced from just six government-run, scientific research reactors abroad. Five of these reactors are 45-65 years old and are quickly coming to the end of their operational life. This has cultivated a fragile and lengthy supply chain, at odds with the nature of radioactive material.

This issue and its implications do not just effect molybdenum, but any other reactor-based isotope. Many promising cancer therapies are stuck in clinical trials, unable to secure enough material in a timely manner. Research doesn’t even happen because of the difficulty of sourcing any new isotopes.

It doesn't have to be this way. Atomic Alchemy is working to solve this by building the world's first scalable radioisotope production facility. This facility will contain the world’s first privately-owned nuclear reactors dedicated to radioisotope production.

founders.name: Thomas Eiden, Founder
founders.description: Former reactor engineer/core designer at the Advanced Test Reactor at Idaho National Laboratory. Performed next-generation nuclear fuels research at the University of Wisconsin-Madison.

# Reliable Isotopes. Resilient Future.
#### Transforming the radioisotope supply chain to meet essential demands in healthcare, industry, research, and defense.
[ Learn More ](https://atomicalchemy.us/</about>)
### Developing and building scalable U.S. radioisotope production capabilities to ensure **consistent access** to critical isotopes.
Revolutionizing isotope production through advanced reactor and recovery technologies to deliver reliable, high-quality isotopes across vital sectors.
  * ![Two men pointing to a part of a yellow machine](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/6724e8f3b1388056ed5d6670/f55c4535-0784-4e67-bdbc-d0a8d96555f2/Adobe_854771330_Resized.png)
## Technology
Our Versatile Isotope Production Reactor (VIPR®) is engineered to produce a wide array of high-value radioisotopes, setting new standards for isotope production.
[Learn More](https://atomicalchemy.us/</technology>)
  * ![Recycled isotopes from used nuclear fuel](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/6724e8f3b1388056ed5d6670/0c0b558e-80c1-4e61-a24c-8d0282774d2b/HALEU+Reguli_1200x630_INL_EDIT.png)
## Fuel Recycling
Using advanced recycling processes, we retrieve valuable isotopes from used nuclear fuel, creating a sustainable, high-quality source of isotopes for diverse applications.
[Learn More](https://atomicalchemy.us/</fuel-recycling>)
  * ![Two culturally diverse men shaking hands in a yellow office](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/6724e8f3b1388056ed5d6670/903a6fef-3f55-481b-b89f-f64af4d30f1c/Partnerships_AI.png)
## Partnerships
Collaboration is key to our mission. We work with industry leaders to enhance our capabilities and expand the reach of our isotope production across multiple sectors.
[Explore Partnerships](https://atomicalchemy.us/</partnerships>)


![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/6724e8f3b1388056ed5d6670/6642ad4c-9afa-4ee0-9f5d-b8426fef93fe/Adobe_860860651_EDIT.png)
### Specializing in the Production of High-value, Life-enhancing Radioisotopes.
Contact us today to learn how a reliable, domestic supply of high-quality isotopes can move your business forward. 
[ Contact Us ](https://atomicalchemy.us/</contact>)
[ ![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/6724e8f3b1388056ed5d6670/8e1f0fd4-d147-4fbb-9fb3-4613d6dadcf5/Atomic+Alchemy+Logo_White_Horizontal.png) ](https://atomicalchemy.us/</about>)

generated_description:
Atomic Alchemy is on a mission to transform nuclear medicine, specifically by producing vital cancer-curing materials. Founded in 2018 and part of Y Combinator Batch W19, this innovative company is based in Idaho Falls, ID, and is tackling a significant issue in the world of radioisotope supply.

Currently, the backbone of nuclear medicine, Molybdenum-99—essential for 80% of procedures—comes from a few aging, government-run reactors abroad. Many of these reactors are nearing the end of their operational life, creating a precarious and inefficient supply chain. This isn’t just a problem for Molybdenum; it extends to other reactor-based isotopes, stalling promising cancer treatments and hindering research efforts.

But it doesn't have to be this way. Atomic Alchemy is building the world’s first scalable radioisotope production facility, featuring privately-owned nuclear reactors specifically designed for this purpose. Their Versatile Isotope Production Reactor (VIPR®) will set new standards, ensuring reliable and high-quality isotopes for healthcare, industry, and research.

In addition to innovative production methods, Atomic Alchemy focuses on sustainability by recycling isotopes from used nuclear fuel, thereby creating a consistent and eco-friendly source of essential isotopes. Collaborating with industry leaders, they aim to enhance the reach and capability of their isotope production.

With a dedicated team of five and ambitious goals, Atomic Alchemy is positioning itself as a pivotal player in the nuclear medicine field. If you're interested in how a dependable supply of high-quality isotopes can benefit you or your business, check them out at [Atomic Alchemy](https://atomicalchemy.us).
